## Form.setValidValues() method

Set valid values for a given field

**Signature:**

```typescript
setValidValues(block: string, field: string | string[], values: string[] | Set<any> | Map<any, any>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | string | The block to set valid values for. |
|  field | string \| string\[\] | The field or fields for which valid values are set. |
|  values | string\[\] \| Set&lt;any&gt; \| Map&lt;any, any&gt; | An array, set, or map containing the valid values. |

**Returns:**

void
